justification: Offer ignores Team B’s win-now, conservative, volume-focused mindset. Asking them to give up a Tier 1 workhorse RB (Justin Garcia) and a veteran WR for an injured boom/bust WR (Eric Davis) and a volatile Tier 4 RB (David Adams) contradicts their stated preferences. Rationale centers on Team A’s stability needs, not B’s incentives. Trade is technically feasible but unrealistic given B’s priorities; explanation is generic and lacks scenario-grounded reasoning.
